changeSet.author: MineStar

preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored CreateTable for WATERTRUCK_REFILL_EVENT as table already exists.

changeSet.comment: MO-3240: Record AWT water refill events

column.name: TIMESTAMP_UTC
column.remarks: The utc time at which the refill operation/activity completed.

column.name: DURATION
column.remarks: The duration of the refill activity roughly from arrival at the refill station to departure.

column.name: WATERTRUCK_OID
column.remarks: The OID of the Water Truck that was refilled.

column.name: WATERTRUCK_NAME
column.remarks: The name of the Water Truck that was refilled.

column.name: WATERTRUCK_MODE
column.remarks: The mode of the Water Truck.

column.name: REFILL_AMOUNT
column.remarks: The amount of water used to refill the Water Truck during this refill event.
